DOC.brief_summary: Since October 2009 , H1N1 influenza vaccine develop approve immunization population China . However , little epidemiological evidence safety vaccinate healthy pregnant woman . The main objective study assess safety split-virion inactivated H1N1 vaccine without adjuvant administer healthy pregnant woman . It stratify controlled clinical trial healthy pregnant woman . And participant include 226 healthy pregnant woman age 18 -35 year old history novel influenza H1N1 infection novel influenza H1N1 vaccination . The pregnancy week range 5 week 32 week . Subjects divide 2 group : vaccinate group（122） unvaccinated group（104） . Subjects vaccinate group administer one dose 15μg H1N1 vaccine . Subjects unvaccinated group receive vaccine control . Safety measure assessment pregnancy outcome . And observation time pregnancy outcomes last 28 day postpartum since vaccinate ; protective effect observe six month .
DOC.brief_title: Safety H1N1 Influenza Vaccination Pregnant Women
DOC.criteria: 1 . Healthy pregnant woman 2 . Be able show legal identity card sake recruitment 3 . Be able understand sign inform consent 1 . Cases , cure case close contact influenza A ( H1N1 ) virus 2 . Subject medical history following : allergic history , allergic ingredient vaccine , egg , egg protein , etc 3 . Serious adverse reaction vaccine anaphylaxis , hive , respiratory difficulty , angioedema , abdominal pain 4 . Autoimmune disease immunodeficiency 5 . Asthma unstable require emergent care , hospitalization intubation past two year require use oral intravenous corticosteroid 6 . Diabetes mellitus ( type I II ) , exception gestational diabetes 7 . History thyroidectomy thyroid disease require medication within past 12 month 8 . Serious angioedema episode within previous 3 year require medication previous two year 9 . Bleeding disorder diagnose doctor ( e.g . factor deficiency , coagulopathy , platelet disorder require special precaution ) significant bruise bleed difficulty IM injection blood draws 10 . Any history immunosuppressive medication cytotoxic medication inhale corticosteroid within past six month ( exception corticosteroid nasal spray allergic rhinitis topical corticosteroid acute uncomplicated dermatitis ) 11 . History blood product seasonal influenza vaccine administration within 3 month dose 12 . Administration investigational research agent within 30 day dose 13 . Administration live attenuate vaccine within 30 day dose 14 . Administration subunit inactivate vaccine , e.g. , pneumococcal vaccine , allergy treatment antigen injection , within 14 day dose 15 . Axillary temperature > 37.0 centigrade time dose 16 . Psychiatric condition precludes compliance protocol 17 . Any medical , psychiatric , social condition , occupational reason responsibility , judgment investigator , contraindication protocol participation impair volunteer 's ability give inform consent
